title: "Temporary Transit Tenement" shall mean habitable residential or non-residential accommodation for eligible S
clause_text: "Temporary Transit Tenement" shall mean habitable residential or non-residential accommodation for eligible S.R.S. beneficiary constructed from detachable material such as tubular / prefabricated light structures or such other material, in such a manner that it ensures safety of the inhabitants. Design criteria for structural elements of transit accommodation shall be similar to those of the rehabilitation tenements, with a maximum carpet area of 16.72 Sq.m. (180 Sq.ft.) for residential and 9.29 Sq.m. (100 Sq.ft.) for non- residential tenement for each transit tenement / unit.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
